ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: Since we are near the border of the Lamanites, we are constantly having to defend ourselves.

dialog.text: The only way I can think of entering Zarahemla is through the north side above Gideon. The wall there has a weakness where we can plant an explosive. Hagoth was just mixing explosives in a cavity of a rock southeast of here. You may still find him there. I suggest you use cloaks to sneak through the Lamanite territory to get there.

Moroni: Gidgiddoni! I am happy to see God has sustained you in defense of this part of our land. However, the city of Nephihah has not fared so well. Do you know why Pahoran did not send them more men? ~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~ Gidgiddoni: It is grave news. I have not been able to glean all the details, but Pahoran has certainly betrayed all of us. There are plenty of men in the lands round about Zarahemla, but none are sent. All entries to the area have been blockaded off so that we cannot intervene. Our judges have grown comfortable sitting upon their throwns in peace while our men continue to die defending the outer cities. Word is they may have even opened communication with Ammoron to strike some sort of a deal. ~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~ And it came to pass that Moroni was angry with the government, because of their indifference concerning the freedom of their country. ~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~ Moroni: Pahoran will grant me an audience, whether or not he wishes it! ~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~ Gidgiddoni: The only way I can think of entering Zarahemla is through the north side above Gideon. The wall there has a weakness where we can plant an explosive. Hagoth was just mixing explosives in a cavity of a rock southeast of here. You may still find him there. I suggest you use cloaks to sneak through the Lamanite territory to get there.
